content.text:
# Art Directors Guild Award for Excellence in Production Design for a Multi-Camera Series

The Art Directors Guild Award for Outstanding Production Design for a Multi-Camera Series is an award handed out annually by the Art Directors Guild. It was introduced at the Art Directors Guilds' fifth annual honors, in 2000, after being combined with regular, one-hour series for the four previous ceremonies (including with miniseries and television films for the first).
Winners and nominations
2000s
